channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Nankai University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: AlphaPruning: Using Heavy-Tailed Self Regularization Theory for Improved Layer-wise Pruning of Large Language Models
item.description: AlphaPruning leverages Heavy-Tailed Self-Regularization theory to allocate optimal layer-wise sparsity ratios in LLMs, achieving 80% sparsity in LLaMA-7B with reasonable perplexity.

item.title: Conformalized Multiple Testing after Data-dependent Selection
item.description: This paper introduces Selective Conformal P-Value (SCPV), a novel method for controlling FDR in conformalized multiple testing after data-dependent selection, offering a unified theoretical framework …

item.title: Faster Diffusion: Rethinking the Role of the Encoder for Diffusion Model Inference
item.description: Faster Diffusion achieves significant speedups in diffusion model inference by cleverly reusing encoder features and enabling parallel processing, eliminating the need for computationally expensive di…

item.title: Grid4D: 4D Decomposed Hash Encoding for High-fidelity Dynamic Gaussian Splatting
item.description: Grid4D: A novel 4D decomposed hash encoding boosts high-fidelity dynamic Gaussian splatting, surpassing state-of-the-art models in visual quality and rendering speed.

item.title: Lighting Every Darkness with 3DGS: Fast Training and Real-Time Rendering for HDR View Synthesis
item.description: LE3D: Real-time HDR view synthesis from noisy RAW images is achieved using 3DGS, significantly reducing training time and improving rendering speed.

item.title: OPUS: Occupancy Prediction Using a Sparse Set
item.description: OPUS: a novel, real-time occupancy prediction framework using a sparse set prediction paradigm, outperforms state-of-the-art methods on Occ3D-nuScenes.

item.title: Real-Time Selection Under General Constraints via Predictive Inference
item.description: II-COS: a novel online sample selection method effectively controls individual and interactive constraints in real-time via predictive inference, improving efficiency and addressing various practical …

item.title: SARDet-100K: Towards Open-Source Benchmark and ToolKit for Large-Scale SAR Object Detection
item.description: SARDet-100K: A new benchmark dataset and open-source toolkit revolutionizes large-scale SAR object detection.

item.title: StoryDiffusion: Consistent Self-Attention for Long-Range Image and Video Generation
item.description: StoryDiffusion enhances long-range image & video generation by introducing a simple yet effective self-attention mechanism and a semantic motion predictor, achieving high content consistency without t…

item.title: To Err Like Human: Affective Bias-Inspired Measures for Visual Emotion Recognition Evaluation
item.description: This paper introduces novel metrics for visual emotion recognition evaluation, considering the psychological distance between emotions to better reflect human perception, improving the assessment of m…

item.title: Token Merging for Training-Free Semantic Binding in Text-to-Image Synthesis
item.description: ToMe: a novel training-free method dramatically improves semantic binding in text-to-image synthesis by intelligently merging related tokens, ensuring accurate alignment between generated images and t…

item.title: Zipper: Addressing Degeneracy in Algorithm-Agnostic Inference
item.description: Zipper: A novel statistical device resolves the degeneracy issue in algorithm-agnostic inference, enabling reliable goodness-of-fit tests with enhanced power.
